entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is described as a person who has been caught by Ron and Harry. He is mentioned to be 'wild-eyed' and 'matted', indicating that he may have been involved in some sort of trouble.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as a person who is quick and able to catch Mundungus's wand. She is not mentioned again after this point.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as a person who rugby-tackled Mundungus and held him down. He is mentioned to be 'panting' after the struggle.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who threw aside a newspaper, crossed the kitchen, and pointed his wand at Mundungus's nose. He is mentioned to be in control of the situation.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is described as a house-elf who apologizes for the delay in bringing the thief (Mundungus).

entities.name: mundungus's wand
entities.description: Mundungus's wand is mentioned to be caught by Hermione and then pointed at Mundungus's nose by Harry.

entities.name: newspaper
entities.description: A newspaper is mentioned to be thrown aside by Harry as he crosses the kitchen.

relationships.description: Hermione caught Mundungus's wand, which was being pulled out by Mundungus.
Ron rugby-tackled Mundungus and held him down on the floor.
Harry pointed his wand at Mundungus's nose, indicating that he was in control of the situation.
Kreacher apologized for bringing Mundungus as a thief.
